spell_tooltip.description: Disarm the enemy's weapons and shield for 5 sec. Disarmed creatures deal significantly reduced damage.
Bladestorm, Ravager, and Demolish  now snare all targets you hit by 60% for 6 sec and decrease their healing taken by 50% for 10 sec.
Colossus Smash causes your next Mortal Strike to deal 15% increased damage and reduce healing taken by 50% for 4 sec.

A balanced combat state that increases the critical strike chance of your abilities by 3% and reduces the duration of movement impairing effects by 10%. 

Lasts until canceled.

A balanced combat state that increases the critical strike chance of your abilities by 3% and reduces the duration of movement impairing effects by 10%. 

Lasts until canceled.

A defensive combat state that reduces all damage you take by 15% and all damage you deal by 10%. 

Lasts until canceled.

A defensive combat state that reduces all damage you take by 15% and all damage you deal by 10%. 

Lasts until canceled.

Your auto-attacks generate 10% more Rage.

Killing an enemy instantly generates 5 Rage and increases your movement speed by 30% for 8 sec.
Leech increased by 3%.

Instantly attack the target, causing 73,777 damage and healing you for 30% of your maximum health.

Killing an enemy that yields experience or honor resets the cooldown of Impending Victory and makes it cost no Rage.
Leap through the air toward a target location, slamming down with destructive force to deal 29,893 Physical damage to all enemies within 8 yards.
Hurls your weapon at an enemy, causing 36,317 Physical damage and stunning for 4 sec.

Restores 6% health every 1 sec when you have not taken damage for 5 sec.

Restores 1% health every 1 sec while you are below 35% health. The amount restored increases the closer you are to death.
Mortal Strike and Cleave have a 20% chance to immediately refund 10% of the Rage spent.
Reduces the cooldown of Heroic Leap by 15 sec and Heroic Leap also increases your movement speed by 70% for 3 sec.

Blasts all enemies within 8 yards for 86,460 Physical damage and reduces their movement speed by 20% for 10 sec. Deals reduced damage beyond 5 targets.

If you have Rend, Thunder Clap affects 5 nearby targets with Rend.
Raise your weapon, reflecting the first spell cast on you and reducing magic damage you take by 20% for 5 sec.
Lets loose a rallying cry, granting all party or raid members within 40 yards 10% temporary and maximum health for 10 sec.
Sends a wave of force in a frontal cone, causing 25,930 damage and stunning all enemies within 10 yards for 2 sec.
Mortal Strike deals an additional 20% damage and deals 20% increased critical strike damage.
Maximum Rage increased by 30.
Stamina increased by 20% and Armor increased by 20%.
Slam, Cleave, and Whirlwind deal 10% more damage and 10% increased critical strike damage.
Charge gains 1 additional charge and its cooldown is reduced by 3 sec.
If Whirlwind or Cleave hits 3 or more enemies it hits them 1 additional time for 30% damage.
While wielding two-handed weapons your damage is increased by 12% and damage taken from area of effect attacks is reduced by 8%.
Haste increased by 4% and your auto-attack critical strikes increase your auto-attack speed by 40% for 10 sec.
Gain Strength equal to 20% of your Armor.
Roar explosively, dealing 318,405 Physical damage to enemies within 12 yds and cause them to bleed for 902,631 physical damage over 16 sec. Deals reduced damage beyond 5 targets.

Transform into a colossus for 20 sec, causing you to deal 20% increased damage and removing all roots and snares.

Generates 10 Rage.
Thunderous Roar's cooldown reduced by 45 sec.
Increases the duration of Thunderous Roar's Bleed effect by 2.0 sec and Thunderous Roar's Bleed effect causes enemies to take 20% increased damage from all your bleeds.
Activating Avatar grants 8 sec of Sweeping Strikes and while Avatar is active the cooldown of Cleave is reduced by 1.5 sec.
A vicious strike that deals 985,726 Physical damage and reduces the effectiveness of healing on the target by 50% for 10 sec.

Overpower the enemy, dealing 422,156 Physical damage. Cannot be blocked, dodged, or parried.

Increases the damage of your next Mortal Strike or Cleave by 15%, stacking up to 2 times
Overpower increases the damage of your next Mortal Strike or Cleave by 15%, stacking up to 2 times.
Increases your parry chance by 100% and reduces all damage you take by 30% for 8 sec.
Execute no longer has a cooldown and if your foe survives, 10% of the Rage spent is refunded.
Overpower has 2 charges and deals 15% more damage.
You are healed for 85% of the damage dealt by Deep Wounds.
If Cleave or Whirlwind hits 2 or more targets you also Slam your primary target.
You have a 2.0% chance per Rage spent on attacks to reset the remaining cooldown on Overpower.
Smashes the enemy's armor, dealing 393,706 Physical damage and increasing damage you deal to them by 30% for 10 sec.
Critical strike damage of your abilities is increased by 10%.

Wounds the target, causing 158,409 Physical damage instantly and an additional 480,403 Bleed damage over 21 sec.

Thunder Clap affects 5 nearby targets with Rend.
Every 20 Rage you spend on attacks reduces the remaining cooldown on Warbreaker, Bladestorm, and Ravager by 1 sec.
Mortal Strike and Cleave have a 20% chance to instantly reset their own cooldowns.
When Sweeping Strikes ends, your next Cleave or Whirlwind deals 25% increased damage for each ability used during Sweeping Strikes that damaged a second target.
Strikes all enemies in front of you for 368,791 Physical damage, inflicting Deep Wounds. Cleave will consume your Overpower effect to deal increased damage. Deals reduced damage beyond 5 targets.
Your Bleed effects deal 20% increased damage.
Overpower causes a seismic wave, dealing 73,297 damage to all enemies in a 10 yd line. Deals reduced damage beyond 5 targets.
Warbreaker increases your Haste by 10%, or by 20% if any target is below 35% health. Lasts for the duration of Warbreaker.
Smash the ground and shatter the armor of all enemies within 10 yds, dealing 393,384 Physical damage and increasing damage you deal to them by 30% for 10 sec.
Mastery increased by 4% and Tactician's chance to trigger is increased by an additional 2.0%.
Increases Versatility by 2% and reduces the cooldown of Die by the Sword by 30.0 sec.
Overpower has a 35% chance to reset the cooldown of Mortal Strike and generate 10 Rage.

Deep Wounds, Rend and Thunderous Roar's Bleed effects last 6.0 sec longer and have a 5% increased critical strike chance.

If you have Rend, Mortal Strike inflicts Rend on targets below 35% health.

Throws a whirling weapon at the target location that chases nearby enemies, inflicting 912,796 Physical damage to all enemies over 9.3 sec. Deals reduced damage beyond 8 targets.

Generates 10 Rage each time it deals damage.
Your Mortal Strike, Cleave and Execute critical strike damage is increased by 10% and your Execute has a 5% increased critical hit chance.
Every other time Bladestorm or Ravager deal damage, you automatically cast a Mortal Strike at your target or random nearby enemy.
Whirlwind and Cleave deal 50% increased damage during Ravager or for 9 sec after Bladestorm ends.

Unleash a series of precise and powerful strikes against your target, dealing 2 million damage to it, and 1.2 million damage to enemies within 8 yds of it. Deals reduced damage beyond 8 targets.

While channeling Demolish, you take 10% less damage and are immune to stuns, knockbacks, and forced movement effects.

You can block, parry, dodge, and use certain defensive abilities while channeling Demolish.
Critical strike damage of your abilities is increased by 10% and the amount of damage blocked by your critical blocks is increased by 20%.

Colossal Might increases damage dealt by your next Demolish by 10%, stacking up to 10 times.

Mortal Strike grants a stack of Colossal Might and Cleave grants a stack of Colossal Might when it strikes 3 or more targets.
Shockwave also knocks enemies into the air and its cooldown is reduced by 5 sec.
Shockwave, Cleave, and Whirlwind deal 5% more damage per target affected up to 5.
Colossal Might increases the damage of your Overpower by 5% per stack.

When your health is brought below 35%, you gain a Second Wind, healing you for 12% of your max health over 2 sec.

This effect cannot occur more than once every 60 sec.
Mortal Strike and Cleave damage increased by 20%.
Mortal Strike critical strikes grant an additional stack of Colossal Might.

You deal 5% more damage and take 5.0% less damage.

Size increased by 5%.

Colossal Might now stacks up to 10 times. If you would gain a stack of Colossal Might and are at max stacks, the cooldown of Demolish is reduced by 2 sec.

Enemies affected by Demolish take up to 10% more damage from you and deal up to 10% less damage to you for 10 sec based on the number of stacks of Colossal Might consumed by Demolish.

Every 3 Slayer's Strikes you gain Sudden Death.

Using Sudden Death accelerates your next Bladestorm, striking 1 additional time (max 3). Bladestorm's total duration is unchanged.
Each strike of Bladestorm applies Overwhelmed to all enemies affected, increasing damage you deal to them by 1% for 20 sec, max 10 stacks.

Charge increases your movement speed by 70% for 3 sec.

Charge removes all movement impairing effects, this effect cannot occur more than once every 30 sec.
You heal for 15% of damage dealt by Sudden Death.
Your next Mortal Strike after Bladestorm ends deals 50% additional damage.
When Overpower has its cooldown reset by Tactician, your next Overpower deals 25% additional damage and 25% additional critical damage.
Marked for Execution increases the critical strike chance and critical strike damage of your next Execute on the target by 15%.

Mortal Strike and Cleave when it hits 3 or more targets have a 20% chance to cause you to unleash a flurry of steel, striking all nearby enemies for 466,029 damage and applying Overwhelmed. Deals reduced damage beyond 8 targets.
Overpower damage increased by 30%.

When you Execute a target that you've Marked for Execution, you both reduce the cooldown of Bladestorm by 5 sec and apply 2 stacks of Overwhelmed to the target per stack of Marked for Execution consumed.

You can use Pummel and Storm Bolt while Bladestorming.

spell_tooltip.description:
Physical damage taken reduced by 2%.

Thunder Blast reduces damage you take by 8% for 5 sec.
Thunder Blast calls down a Lightning Strike on an enemy it hits.

Lightning Strikes generate 3 Rage.

Raging Blow and Execute damage increased by 25%.
Lightning Strikes have a 15% chance to make your next 2 Bloodthirsts have no cooldown.

Casting Avatar grants you 2 charges of Thunder Blast and resets the cooldown of Thunder Clap.

While Avatar is not active, Lightning Strikes have a 10% chance to grant you Avatar for 4 secs.

Thunder Blast
Your next Thunder Clap becomes a Thunder Blast that deals Stormstrike damage.

An aggressive combat state that increases the damage of your auto-attacks by 15% and reduces the duration of Fear, Sap and Incapacitate effects on you by 10%.

Lasts until canceled.

A defensive combat state that reduces all damage you take by 15% and all damage you deal by 10%. 

Lasts until canceled.
Leech increased by 3%.

Instantly attack the target, causing 74,054 damage and healing you for 30% of your maximum health.

Killing an enemy that yields experience or honor resets the cooldown of Impending Victory and makes it cost no Rage.
Leap through the air toward a target location, slamming down with destructive force to deal 29,844 Physical damage to all enemies within 8 yards.
Hurls your weapon at an enemy, causing 36,536 Physical damage and stunning for 4 sec.

Restores 6% health every 1 sec when you have not taken damage for 5 sec.

Restores 1% health every 1 sec while you are below 35% health. The amount restored increases the closer you are to death.
Reduces the cooldown of Heroic Leap by 15 sec and Heroic Leap also increases your movement speed by 70% for 3 sec.

When you take any damage, heal for 2.0% of your maximum health. 

This can only occur once every 10 sec.
Raise your weapon, reflecting the first spell cast on you and reducing magic damage you take by 20% for 5 sec.
Lets loose a rallying cry, granting all party or raid members within 40 yards 10% temporary and maximum health for 10 sec.
Sends a wave of force in a frontal cone, causing 25,772 damage and stunning all enemies within 10 yards for 2 sec.
Maximum Rage increased by 30.
Shockwave's range increased by 6 yards and when it strikes at least 3 targets its cooldown is reduced by 15 sec.
Stamina increased by 10% and Armor increased by 10%.
Charge gains 1 additional charge and its cooldown is reduced by 3 sec.
While dual wielding your damage is increased by 3% and movement speed is increased by 2%.
Critical strike chance increased by 2% and critical strike damage of Execute increased by 10%.
Haste increased by 4% and your auto-attack critical strikes increase your auto-attack speed by 40% for 10 sec.
Roar explosively, dealing 319,661 Physical damage to enemies within 12 yds and cause them to bleed for 902,631 physical damage over 16 sec. Deals reduced damage beyond 5 targets.
Increases the duration of Thunderous Roar's Bleed effect by 2.0 sec and Thunderous Roar's Bleed effect causes enemies to take 20% increased damage from all your bleeds.
While Avatar is active Rampage's Rage cost is reduced by 20 and Bloodthirst's cooldown is reduced by 1.5 sec.

Assault the target in a bloodthirsty craze, dealing 406,261 Physical damage and restoring 3% of your health.

Generates 8 Rage.

A mighty blow with both weapons that deals a total of 379,960 Physical damage.

Generates 12 Rage.
Enrage increases the damage your abilities deal by an additional 15% and Enrage's duration is increased by 1 sec.
Reduces damage taken by 30% and Bloodthirst restores an additional 20% health for 8 sec. Usable while stunned or incapacitated.
Execute no longer costs Rage and now generates 20 Rage.
Bloodthirst damage increased by 10%.
You take 10% reduced damage while Enrage is active.
While Enraged, Raging Blow deals 15% increased damage.
While Enraged, your auto-attacks can no longer miss.
Enrages you and unleashes a series of 4 brutal strikes for a total of 580,125 Physical damage.
Raging Blow has 2 charges and has a 25% chance to instantly reset its own cooldown.
Bloodthirst critical strikes generate 4 additional Rage and inflict a Gushing Wound that leeches 340,310 health over 12 sec.
Rampage increases your Haste by 2% for 12 sec, stacking up to 4 times. This effect is reset if you Rampage a different primary target.
Each Rampage strike has a 25% chance to refund a charge of Raging Blow.
Raging Blow causes every strike of your next Rampage to deal an additional 20% damage, stacking up to 5 times.

Whirlwind causes your next 2 single-target attacks to strike up to 4 additional targets for 55% damage.

Whirlwind generates 3 Rage, plus an additional 1 per target hit. Maximum 8 Rage.
Your Bleed effects deal 20% additional damage.
Raging Blow increases the critical strike chance of your next Bloodthirst by 15% until it critically strikes, stacking up to 5 times.
Go berserk, increasing all Rage generation by 100% and granting your abilities 20% increased critical strike chance for 12 sec.
Raging Blow deals 15% increased damage and while Enraged, Raging Blow has a 10% increased chance to instantly reset its own cooldown.
Whirlwind deals 25% more damage and affects your next 4 single-target attacks.
Mastery increased by 2% and if you are Enraged, Bloodthirst extends your Enrage by 1.0 sec.
Critical Strike chance increased by 2% and Raging Blow's critical strikes deal 10% increased damage.

Become an unstoppable storm of destructive force, striking all nearby enemies for 1.6 million Physical damage over 4.7 sec. Deals reduced damage beyond 8 targets.

You are immune to movement impairing and loss of control effects, but can use defensive abilities and can avoid attacks.

Activating Recklessness generates 50 Rage and while Recklessness is active, Raging Blow and Bloodthirst are replaced by Crushing Blow and Bloodbath.

 Crushing Blow
Strike a mighty blow with both weapons that deals a total of 460,103 Physical damage. 

Crushing Blow has a 25% chance to instantly reset its own cooldown and its critical strikes deal 20% additional damage.

Generates 12 Rage.

 Bloodbath
Assault the target in a bloodthirsty craze, dealing 488,484 Physical damage and restoring 3% of your health.

Bloodbath causes the target to bleed for 168,054 damage over 12 sec. Using Bloodbath on a target that is affected by Bloodbath extends the bleed by 12 sec.

Generates 8 Rage.

Unleashes your power, dealing 644,859 Physical damage and an additional 746,510 Physical damage over 10 sec to all enemies within 12 yards. Deals reduced damage beyond 5 targets.

Generates 15 Rage.
Every other time Bladestorm or Ravager deal damage, you automatically cast a Mortal Strike at your target or random nearby enemy.
Odyn's Fury's Enrages you, deals 10% increased damage and grants you 2 stacks of Whirlwind.

Every 3 Slayer's Strikes you gain Sudden Death.

Using Sudden Death accelerates your next Bladestorm, striking 1 additional time (max 3). Bladestorm's total duration is unchanged.
Each strike of Bladestorm applies Overwhelmed to all enemies affected, increasing damage you deal to them by 1% for 20 sec, max 10 stacks.

Charge increases your movement speed by 70% for 3 sec.

Charge removes all movement impairing effects, this effect cannot occur more than once every 30 sec.
You heal for 15% of damage dealt by Sudden Death.
Your next Mortal Strike after Bladestorm ends deals 50% additional damage.
When Overpower has its cooldown reset by Tactician, your next Overpower deals 25% additional damage and 25% additional critical damage.
Marked for Execution increases the critical strike chance and critical strike damage of your next Execute on the target by 15%.

Mortal Strike and Cleave when it hits 3 or more targets have a 20% chance to cause you to unleash a flurry of steel, striking all nearby enemies for 471,479 damage and applying Overwhelmed. Deals reduced damage beyond 8 targets.
Overpower damage increased by 30%.

When you Execute a target that you've Marked for Execution, you both reduce the cooldown of Bladestorm by 5 sec and apply 2 stacks of Overwhelmed to the target per stack of Marked for Execution consumed.
